remarks:
Eliminate a disjunction in a deduction.  A translation of natural deduction rule ` \/ ` E ( ` \/ ` elimination), see ~ natded . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)

 Eliminate a disjunction in a deduction.  A translation of natural deduction rule ` \/ ` E ( ` \/ ` elimination).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
statement:
jaodan.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ch ) $.
jaodan.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ th ) -> ch ) $.
jaodan.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps \/ th ) ) $.
mpjaodan $p |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
